description: This Python source file sets up an AI agent named 'Agno_Assist' with various tools, knowledge base, and storage configurations for the Agno framework. It includes imports, path setup, knowledge initialization, agent creation, and configuration details.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific tools, knowledge, and configuration.

classes.name: OpenAIEmbedder
classes.description: Embeds text using OpenAI models for vector similarity search.

classes.name: UrlKnowledge
classes.description: Stores and manages knowledge URLs for the agent.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model used for conversational AI.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of session data in an SQLite database.

classes.name: DalleTools
classes.description: Provides tools for generating images with DALL-E.

classes.name: ElevenLabsTools
classes.description: Provides tools for text-to-speech using Eleven Labs.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads knowledge data into UrlKnowledge, with an option to recreate.
